page.title: 14PEOPLE AND BUILDINGS.
page.content: MOST OF THE PEOPLE IN THIS AREA LIVE IN SMALL COMMUNITIES OR FARMS. THE MAIN SETTLEMENT IS FORTON, A VILLAGE OF OVER 100 INHABITANTS. THE SMALLER COMMUNITIES IN THE AREA ARE PULESTON AND PICKSTOCK. {FORTON VILLAGE.} FORTON IS A NUCLEAR SETTLEMENT GROUPED AROUND A CROSSROADS. IT HAS 6 PRINCIPAL BUILDINGS, THE PARISH CHURCH, FORTON HALL, THE PARISH HALL, THE SCHOOL HOUSE, WHAT WAS AQUALATE SCHOOL AND FORTON LODGE, NOW A DISCOTEQUE. BESIDES THE MAIN BUILDINGS THERE ARE 26 RESIDENCES IN FORTON. THE A519 ROAD RUNS THROUGH MIDDLE OF FORTON, FROM NEWPORT TO THE SOUTH WEST, TO ECCLESHALL IN THE NORTH EAST. THE NEAREST SHOPS ARE 2 MILES AWAY IN NEWPORT.
